```css
// Property: cameraFlashMode
// Description: Determines how the flash is fired when using the device's camera.
// Component(s): Ti.Media
'.camera-flash-mode-auto': { cameraFlashMode: Ti.Media.CAMERA_FLASH_AUTO }
'.camera-flash-mode-off': { cameraFlashMode: Ti.Media.CAMERA_FLASH_OFF }
'.camera-flash-mode-on': { cameraFlashMode: Ti.Media.CAMERA_FLASH_ON }
```
